Squidpy
=======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which Squidpy installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using Squidpy, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load Squidpy/1.4.1-foss-2023a
```
